Log:
MixUp 1.8.3.0: NEW: Visual 3D motion scene editor for robot arms NEW: Synchronization of virtual scene motion with real robot arm (Real-Time editing mode) NEW: Pose preview in robot arm scene display NEW: Pose display type (virtual camera view) NEW: Ability to arrange characters in a virtual robotic arm scene NEW: Ability to customize the banner in the virtual robot arm scene NEW: Robotic arm visualization scene editor NEW: Robotic arm camera parameters for recording 3D visualization NEW: Record visualization from the virtual robotic arm camera and directly upload it to the video editor for further customization of the processing template
FIX: Fixed processing of robot arm statuses FIX: Fixed handling of some Web cameras. (Zoom setting removed from Web cameras parameters) FIX: Slightly changed AI Wizard menu interface FIX: Fixed localization errors
